Figure data from Kahle et al., 2012, Fig. 11, right panel. 
Kahle, E.C., Holme, C., Jones, T.R., Gkinis, V., Steig, E.J., 2018. A Generalized Approach to Estimating Diffusion Length of Stable Water Isotopes From Ice-Core Data. Journal of Geophysical Research: Earth Surface 123, 2377â€“2391. https://doi.org/10.1029/2018JF004764
As neither of the authors Kahle, Holme or Gkinis could supply the source data for the figure, it was digitised from the pdf figure. The digitization error, quantified by replication, is negligible compared to the method uncertainty.
